title: LP gains for all Diamond players have been tanked since 2 pm today
body: Im only receiving half the normal LP for wins in diamond 4 today since 2 pm. Early on i was getting 20 a win, now im getting between 9-13. Its not just me either, my duo is also getting low amounts, and every game we have been in, the all team members have been getting less than 15 lp. Does anyone know why this is?
